assignments.description: Define the values of task to be inserted as part of this flow.
assignments.name: Define_remaining_task_variables
assignments.label: Define remaining task variables

assignments.name: Set_due_date_to_inputted_date
assignments.label: Set due date to inputted date

assignments.name: Set_target_start_date_to_input
assignments.label: Set target start date to input

assignments.name: Set_task_owner_dedicated_specialist
assignments.label: Set task owner to dedicated specialist

assignments.name: Set_task_owner_to_case_owner
assignments.label: Set task owner to case owner

assignments.name: Set_task_owner_to_chosen_user
assignments.label: Set task owner to chosen user

assignments.name: Set_task_owner_to_dedicated_specialist
assignments.label: Set task owner to dedicated specialist

assignments.label: Set task owner to opportunity owner

assignments.name: Set_task_owner_to_specified_user
assignments.label: Set task owner to specified user

assignments.name: Set_task_owner_to_suitability_planner
assignments.label: Set task owner to suitability planner

decisions.description: Checks who the task should be assigned to based on the task information settings and routes appropriately
decisions.name: Assignment_type
decisions.label: Assignment type

decisions.description: Checks if a due date was provided as an input so this can be used or otherwise calculated using the task information due date offset.
decisions.name: Due_date_provided
decisions.label: Due date provided?

decisions.description: If a task information record found, process based on information on the task information record.
decisions.name: Task_information_record_found
decisions.label: Task information record found?

decisions.description: If a task information name has been provided, then attempt to query that record.
decisions.name: Task_information_reference_provided
decisions.label: Task information reference provided?

decisions.description: Routes differently depending on the mode applicable to this request.
decisions.name: task_mode
decisions.label: Mode?

Flow.description: New version to change target start date assignment

formulas.description: The turnaround time as a negative number to input into the flow that calculates a date subtracting business days.
formulas.name: turnaround_time

Flow.label: Task - create from task information

recordLookups.description: Looks for a task information record associated with the task type provided as an input to the flow.
recordLookups.name: Get_task_information_record
recordLookups.label: Get task information record

textTemplates.name: error_email
textTemplates.text:
Hi guys


Sorry to be the bearer of bad news here, just got a task that didn't go so well.


What ID: {!what_id}

Household ID: {!household_id}

Task type: {!task_type}

Due date input: {!due_date_input}

Target start date: {!target_start_date_input}

Fault message: {!faultMessage}

 

Related advice: {!related_advice_id}

Related AML&KYC: {!related_aml_kyc_id}

Related annual review: {!related_annual_review}

Related LOA: {!related_loa}

Related mortgage opportunity: {!related_mortgage_application}

Related opportunity: {!related_opportunity}

Related provider: {!related_provider}

 

Good luck, enjoy!


From The Task - create from task information Flow

variables.description: The flow can accept as an input a specific due date which will be used instead of what's on the task information record if provided.
variables.name: due_date_input

variables.description: The ID of the household to which this task relates.
variables.name: household_id

variables.description: The type of task processing to apply here, either: - creating a new one (the default) - credit/shift - create a new task with some reference to the original - shift - reassign the task to the appropriate owner and update the due date
variables.name: mode

variables.description: Stores the complete details of the original task.
variables.name: original_task

variables.description: Stores the ID of who the task should be assigned to.
variables.name: ownerId

variables.description: If the task should be assigned to a queue, this variable will store the developer name of that queue.
variables.name: queueDeveloperName

variables.description: ID of any related advice records
variables.name: related_advice_id

variables.description: ID of any related AML/KYC records
variables.name: related_aml_kyc_id

variables.description: ID of any related annual review records
variables.name: related_annual_review

variables.description: ID of any related LOA records
variables.name: related_loa

variables.description: The ID of any related mortgage application.
variables.name: related_mortgage_application

variables.description: The task to be created as part of this flow.
variables.name: task

variables.description: The ID of any original task being processed in this flow.
variables.name: task_id

variables.description: The task type to be created, accepted as an input from other flows.
variables.name: task_type

variables.description: The ID of the record to which this task should be related, provided as an input.
variables.name: what_id

variables.description: The ID of the person to which this task should be related, provided as an input.
variables.name: who_id
